text:
The team at Bedrock Bar and Grill were truly amazing! Our servers, Anne and James, were courteous and thoroughly explained each part of our dining experience. Anne is incredibly attentive and friendly and even surprised us with complimentary desserts to celebrate both my birthday and my cousin‚Äôs.

Chloe, the host, was also warm, jolly and welcoming üôÇ

The food was excellent‚Äîkudos to the chefs for their skill and effort!

Definitely will come back again üòç

It was a dinner celebration for a friend‚Äôs birthday. We pre-ordered a tomahawk and it was cut according to the weight we could handle, 1.9kg bone-in. We got a couple of sides to pair - a potato mash, Mac and cheese, broccolini, and mushrooms. The tomahawk was beautifully seared with the charred bits adding a nice salty smokiness to every bite. We didn‚Äôt get wine because we were driving but on hind sight we could have as it would have added some acidity to our rich meat and buttery sides. Nonetheless, the meal was enjoyable and the room allocated was cosy enough for us to be apart from the bustling side of the restaurant. The service was attentive and impressive as well. Bedrock is still one of our preferred steak houses.

Back at Bedrock after a long time and food was still as great. We ordered the Tomahawk and shared Lobster Bisque, Mac & Cheese, and Truffle Fries, all of which were simply delicious. Best part of today's dining experience was being attended to by Gary, who was sincere, attentive, and added his brand of humour to our interaction. Won't be long before we're back again!

Steak is amazingly well cooked!!
We ordered the Porterhouse 1kg and it is worth it!
Andy and the team has been amazing providing us with such amazing service!
The bone marrow‚Ä¶. CHEF‚ÄôS KISS!!! BIG JUICY PORTION
Thank you!

Get the Australian steak ($78) for sharing and pair it with the Mac and cheese (nothing like what you expect‚Äîit‚Äôs awesome) with their house beer. Fantastic. They let us dine at 9:45pm and let us stay 45 minutes past closing (10:45pm). Service is great. You know it‚Äôs a real steak house when they don‚Äôt serve rice. I posted food-in-progress so you can see the actual. Service and food are really top notch.
